activity.text: No, it is not strictly needed for the symptom question because the symptoms history section content size does change, the width of the panel remains constant. Unlike Medication History, where the table layout, dynamic rows, and dropdowns can cause width shifts and overflow.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12254
activity.text:
https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/38cc91fc-0374-452e-bec9-744034bd8f26

Added a delay to the scrollToTop to handle route changes consistency across browsers. Firefox requires a small delay after route changes to ensure the page content is fully rendered before scrolling to the top unlike other browsers like Chrome, which handle the scroll more immediately.
